FOUND IN: Tee - A small peg used to elevate a golf ball off the ground for the initial drive.
Sodium hydroxide (NaOH - highly caustic and used as drain cleaner)
Torrid - extremely hot and dry climatic conditions typically found in tropical regions.
Deadend street - A street that ends at a dead end or does not connect to any other road.
Tweet - The light, brief sounds that many small songbirds make when they sing or call to one another.
Laggard - A person who moves slowly or is behind others; tardy.
